page.syntax: Bytes_Appended as N = Append_Line(C Filename, C string)

argument.name: Bytes_Appended
argument.description: The size increase of the file.

argument.name: Filename
argument.description: The file that receives the character or blob data.

argument.name: string
argument.description: The text to add to FileName.

page.description: Writes a string to a file followed by a carriage return and line feed.
page.discussion: The FILE.APPEND_LINE() method appends text to the end of a file. It terminates each append with a CR-LF. The method creates the file if it does not already exist.
page.example: ? File.Append_Line("MyFile.txt", "the rest of the line...") = 23 ? File.Append_Line("MyFile.txt", "And some more...") = 16
